Class R_NodeManager

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.proxy.ProxyManager<R_Node>
us.mn.state.dot.tms.client.roads.R_NodeManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
CorridorFinder<R_Node>
public class R_NodeManager extends ProxyManager<R_Node> implements CorridorFinder<R_Node>
R_Node manager provides proxies for roadway nodes.
Author:
Douglas Lau
